evidence.text: ORDER of USCA Denying the motion for an administrative stay and a stay pending appeal (ECF 13) in this case as to 26 Notice of Appeal filed by Peter A. Feldman, Scott Bessent, Russell Vought and Donald J. Trump. (slss, Deputy Clerk) (Entered: 07/01/2025)

extracted.value: July 1, 2025: denial of stay pending appeal

evidence.text: Memorandum Order granting 31 Motion for Leave to File Declaration of Tripp DeMoss; denying 27 Motion to Stay the Court's Order Pending Appeal. Signed by Judge Matthew J. Maddox on 6/23/2025.
